---
title: "About this blog"
---

This blog provides reproducible examples of data wrangling, visualisation, and analysis in [R](https://www.r-project.org/) and is written using [distill for R Markdown](https://github.com/rstudio/distill).
Each post uses a [#TidyTuesday data set](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday); these data sets are provided by the [R for Data Science (R4DS)](https://github.com/rfordatascience) community.
This blog is [deployed using netlify](https://tidytuesday.netlify.app/) and all source files are available on [GitHub](https://github.com/rnnh/TidyTuesday).
External links for each post as well as the R Markdown and R source files are provided in the [README](https://github.com/rnnh/TidyTuesday/blob/main/README.md#posts) file, which also contains a [Graph Gallery](https://github.com/rnnh/TidyTuesday/blob/main/README.md#graph-gallery).
Full article content via [RSS is now available](https://github.com/rnnh/TidyTuesday/commit/3608329d5a880c6d9647c0d4e21c9763388de618) though the [index.xml](https://tidytuesday.netlify.app/index.xml) page.
